title: test_custom_strategy_creation_and_signal_generation
description: Verify that users can create custom trading strategies by inheriting from QuantStrategy and correctly implement generate_signals() and calculate_position() methods.

title: test_backtesting_execution_and_performance_output
description: Ensure that the backtest() function executes successfully on historical data and produces meaningful performance metrics such as returns and Sharpe ratio.

title: test_utility_functions_for_returns_and_sharpe_ratio
description: Test the utility functions calculate_returns() and calculate_sharpe_ratio() for accurate calculations including handling edge cases like empty or single-value data series.

title: test_exchange_integration_and_authentication
description: Validate that the Exchange1024ex integration supports authentication, modular API access for Perp, Spot, Prediction, Championship, and Account modules, and trading operations.

title: test_data_retrieval_from_multiple_sources
description: Check that the DataRetriever and BacktestDataset correctly aggregate market and financial data from multiple sources with standardized formats and proper error handling.

title: test_live_trading_session_and_real_time_data_processing
description: Verify that live trading sessions can be started using start_trading and LiveTrader, process real-time market data via WebSocket, and execute trades with Webhook callbacks.

title: test_runtime_monitoring_and_reporting_tools
description: Ensure that RuntimeReporter and RuntimeConfig provide reliable real-time monitoring of trading activities and allow configuration adjustments at runtime.

title: test_custom_exception_handling_and_error_messages
description: Test that all custom exceptions derived from Quant1024Exception provide informative error messages and do not cause the application to crash during API, trading, or authentication errors.
